text: What's up, outliers? Quick market update today. I specifically want to talk about the Fed Watch tool. So I actually want to talk about what I'm seeing behind the scenes. So first let's grab the futures. And let's take a look first at Bond behavior. So we have ZNZT both down pretty significantly and trailing down hard. And if we pop over to the chart and we take a look at the corresponding yields, you'll notice exactly what you would expect to see. Something like the 10 year is now up over 4 again. This is not good. From a broad market perspective, this is not good. And I as hopefully now, I'm not in the game of doom and gloom hyperbole. I really avoid those kind of like language patterns so that what I say means what I'm trying to say. This is not good. The reason why this is not good is because it really starts to call into question what terminal rates will look like and what this whole inflation and rate cutting pictures going to look like.
